jdbcService.sql: select mde.id, mde.name, count(*) from ~master_data_entries mde join ~node_tags nt on nt.definition_id = mde.id and mde.owner_id = :blogId join ~nodes n on nt.node_id = n.id and n.component_id = (select id from components where name='blogPost') and n.parent_id = :blogId where (:q is null or lower(mde.name) like lower('%' || :q || '%')) group by mde.id, mde.name
